requirementText.name: Submission agreement
requirementText.description: A reference to the Submission Agreement associated with the package. @TYPE is used with the value "SUBMISSIONAGREEMENT". Example: RA 13-2011/5329; 2012-04-12 Example: http://submissionagreement.kb.se/dnr331-1144-2011/20120711/ Note: It is recommended to use a machine-readable format for a better description of a submission agreement. For example, the submission agreement developed by Docuteam GmbH http://www.loc.gov/standards/mets/profiles/00000041.xml See also: Alternative record ID's, https://earksip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyaltrecordIDTYPE.

testCase.description: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='SUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] MAY exist. If mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='SUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] exists then it MUST have a text node with a reference to the Submission Agreement associated with the package. mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='SUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] MAY exist only once.

error.message: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='SUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] does not exist. MAY be: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='SUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] exists and its text is a reference to the Submission Agreement associated with the package.
